text: Megalodontoidea is a superfamily of fossil bivalves in the order Megalodontida. The following families are included in Megalodontoidea: *†Ceratomyopsidae *†Dicerocardiidae *†Megalodontidae *†Pachyrismatidae *†Wallowaconchidae ==References== Category:Bivalve superfamilies Category:Bivalve taxonomy Category:Prehistoric bivalves
title: Megalodontoidea
